characters: VIGNETTES OF CHILDREN AROUND THE WORLD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow-covered trees in every direction. The ice in the pon continues to crack, until finally a hole splinters open. young man floats out of the water, bathed in the intense moonlight. This is JACK FROST - thin, pale, barefoot, his tousled hair frosted white.

dialogues.speaker: JACK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: But then...then I saw the moon. It was so big and it was so bright, and it seemed to chase the darkness away. And when it did...I wasn't scared anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack floats back down onto the ice as the hole closes up underneath him.

dialogues.speaker: JACK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Why I was there, and what I was meant to do - that I've never known. And a part of me wonders if I ever will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks around, confused, then turns toward the moonli as it dims a bit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack carefully treads across the ice until he hits someth with his feet. He looks down, and at his feet is a wooden staff. Curious, he picks it up. Almost immediately the staff begins to glow a cold blue in his hands. Odd. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack almost drops it as the base of the staff comes in contact with the ground. Frost shoots out and spreads acr the ice. Jack is visibly confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He touches a few trees with his staff sending frost up th trunks. Then he swings the staff again, more confident, a he begins to run across the frozen pond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another swing, and a gust of wind swirls him high up into air. Jack floats for a moment only to fall back down to earth and into the trees. Jack grabs hold of a tree branc and pulls himself up to see a small town off in the dista

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A collection of simple timber houses with thatched roofs. Jack comes in for a landing, and it's a rocky one. He sta up, still elated, and brushes himself off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jack makes his way into town, settlers are warming the hands by campfire. Jack doesn't recognize anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the townsfolk) Hello. Hello. Good evening, ma'am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ma'am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The settlers walk past Jack, not noticing him. Jack crouc down as a YOUNG BOY runs toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, ah, excuse me, can you tell me where I am?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boy runs right through Jack, as if he were a ghost. J staggers back in shock. He's speechless, as if the wind h been knocked out him. His emotions causing it to snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello! Hello!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Townsfolk continue to pass through Jack, unaware of his presence. Shaken, Jack turns and retreats into the forest

dialogues.speaker: JACK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: My name is Jack Frost -- how do I know that? The moon told me so. But that was all he ever told me. And that was a long, long time ago. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pan up as the moon shines down over the snow covered trees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FIERY GYPSY VIOLIN MUSIC as we move through clouds to rev a MASSIVE ICE CANYON, and just around a bend, the incredi hidden fortress of NORTH, aka SANTA CLAUS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We glimpse a familiar-looking RED JACKET and CAP with whi trim on a coat hanger just as a pair of tongs SLAM a bloc ice onto a stone work table--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IN QUICK CUTS: A CHAINSAW shears the block in half, spray ice. North lifts up the chainsaw revealing a massive tato on his arm, the word NAUGHTY clearly visible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three ELVES huddle in a doorway around a plate of cookies each licking their own tasty morsel.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Still waiting for cookies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As North crosses the background, the elves lower the cook from their mouths, their faces frozen in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elves duck out of the way as North launches himself across the floor on his rolling chair -- CLOSE as his hug HAND gropes furiously among his WORK TOOLS, finally grabb a miniature HAMMER. As North's humming along with his mus delicately CHISELING into the ice, we see a second arm sl tatoo, the word NICE clearly visible--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His INTENSE BLUE EYE magnified in a JEWELER'S EYEPIECE -- delicate SCULPTING TOOL cuts fine details into the ice--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hands place the finished piece on a curving ICE TRACK ice LOCOMOTIVE. It belches ice vapor and chugs down the track, picking up speed--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North's hand grabs a cookie from a plate held up by the t Elves. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the elves gives his cohort a look and points to th plate as it chews with a mouth full of food, to which it unfurls its tongue and lets the half eaten morsels spill onto the plate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, finally!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He takes a bite and leans toward the ice track. He chuckl as the train hits a loop, and launches off a ramp into mi -- then WINGS unfold -- JET ENGINES sprout and ignite and train lifts off the track--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the DOOR is thrown open by one of North's conce YETIS, sending the flying ice locomotive skidding across floor in pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Arghbal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ach!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The yeti cries out covering his mouth in shame. North cri out, devastated. The yeti, equally emotional, lets out another whimper. North looks down at the broken toy and takes a moment to collect himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many times have I told you to knock?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warga blarghgha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What...? The Globe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North leaps up -- draws a HUGE SCIMITAR from its sheath a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sea of tiny BELLS on the heads of panicking elves part North's huge boots stomp through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shoo with your pointy heads. Why are you always under boot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes his way past a couple of his YETI WORKERS -- they're looking up in fear at - Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Covered with LIGHTS blanketing the continents. But North notices that all at once, HUNDREDS OF LIGHTS suddenly go

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now MORE LIGHTS, in GREATER NUMBERS, as if something is snuffing them out by the thousands. North's concern grows

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you checked the axis? Is rotation balanced?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wardle bawddrel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before the Yeti can finish, a WIND whips up from out of nowhere -- North stares in outrage as a blanket of SWIRLI BLACK SAND, crawls over the lights, and shrouds the ENTIR GLOBE in inky DARKNESS--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elves scurry in a panic, then all at once the BLACK S WHOOSHES UP off the Globe -- rushes up through the ceilin the remaining sand bursts into a puff of smoke and dissip into the air --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the wind dies, the scattered pieces of debris settle t the ground, and the globes lights come back on, North whi to see a HUGE SHADOW flash across the floors and curving walls of his fortress. It quickly disappears, leaving nothing but the distant ECHO of...LAUGHTER?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North is frozen, looking up into the darkness, gravely:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can it be? (then calls off) Dingle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A group of elves step forward gleefully pointing to themselves, as if they're all "Dingle". The excitement quickly turns to confusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make preparations! We are going to have company.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North reaches out for a large EMERGENCY LEVER, TWISTS and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 6.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Globe pulses with ENERGY, which lights up and ZOOMS U the AXIS SHAFT toward the roof--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the tallest spire of North's fortress, NORTHERN LIGH ENERGY radiates outward: for the first time in decades, t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A little fairy, carrying a coin, flies above the head of sleeping child. She quickly ducks under the pillow and co out the other side with a tooth in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hundreds of fairies fly toward a hollowed out mountain, t is Tooth's palace and it's a majestic site.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dozens of tiny FAIRIES flit about. Teeth are filed away i tiny wooden drawers. Coins are handed out.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Chicago, Sector 6 -- 37 molars, 22 bicuspids, 18 central incisors. Moscow, Sector 9 -- 22 incisors, 18 premolars: Uh oh, heavy rain advisory!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Des Moines, we've got a cuspid at 23 Maple. Head out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hive of activity, and at the center a winged figure bar out orders like a harried air-traffic controller. This is TOOTH. A Mini Tooth Fairy flies up to Tooth as thousands tiny MINI TOOTH FAIRIES continue their work behind them.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And suddenly everything stops. Tooth whips around, and we finally see her beautiful FACE. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 7.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's holding up a little tooth, and gazing at it with dr adoration. The surrounding fairies tweet with excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's her first tooth. Have you ever seen a more adorable lateral incisor in all of your life?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look how she flossed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fairies' tweets turn to concern, turning Tooth's attention to North's AURORA SIGNAL stretching across the She gasps, and flies off like a rocket toward the source the signal, accompanied by a few of her ranking fairies.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: My fellow Guardians - It is our job to watch over the children of the world, and keep them safe - to bring wonder, hope and dreams. And so, I've called us all here for one reason, and one reason only - the children are in danger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much of this we hear over the following...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull out from the face of a sleeping child to reveal a stream of sand swirling overhead. It's a dream and it's t the shape of a child playing soccer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We FOLLOW the Dreamsand stream out his window and up into sky where we see DOZENS of strands of sand descending to earth. Keep following up, through majestic CLOUDS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...to reveal a small, GLOWING GOLDEN CLOUD of Dreamsand shimmering among the clouds, trailing the golden threads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The strands are being controlled by a small portly figure THE SANDMAN. Suddenly, North's emergency signal zips by. Sandman turns to look and his eyes narrow, visibly concer

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy closes his eyes and in an instant the Dreamsand clo suddenly SWIRLS around him, changing form into a small BIPLANE, with Sandy in the cockpit. He BARREL ROLLS the plane into a dizzying dive through the spectacular clouds and flies off into the distance. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 8.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: An enemy we have kept at bay for centuries has finally decided to strike back. We alone can stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Much of this we hear over the following...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few EASTER EGGS pop up out of the ground; their little carry them out of the way of a fast approaching object.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Speeding along through a subterranean tunnel, we can bare keep up with a DIMLY-LIT FIGURE as it races at blinding speed, leaping and zigzagging through a series of TUNNELS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hole opens in the snow, and a pair of rabbit ears pops A huge rabbit climbs out and brushes off the snow, annoye The six foot tall figure is BUNNYMUND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, it's freezing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shivers with cold, then goes slogging through the snow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't feel my feet! I can't feel my feet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the distance is North's ornately decorated and dimly l palace built into the side of a mountain of ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy's biplane circles the massive chamber, leaving trai of Dreamsand.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Cookies? Eggnog, anyone?

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh, this better be good, North. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 9.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (to her fairies) Montreal, sector six: ten premolars, eight incisors and twelve canines. Steer clear of the wild goose migration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy, thank you for coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy descends from the plane and floats to the ground. H joins North, Bunny and Tooth as they walk through the Glo Room. Sand glyphs appear above Sandy's head communicating that he is busy and has a lot of work to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, I know, but I obviously wouldn't have called you all here unless it was serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North, Bunny, Tooth and Sandy reach the center of the roo Tooth does her best to shush her mini-fairies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Boogie Man was here - at the Pole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North points to the globe. The other Guardians turn to lo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch? Pitch Black? Here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! There was black sand covering the globe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What, what...what do you mean black sand?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And then a shadow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on, hold on, I thought you said you saw Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, ah, not exactly... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 10.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not exactly? Can you believe this guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny turns to Sandy, who shrugs while forming a Dreamsan question mark above his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you said it, Sandy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny goes back to painting one of his Easter eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, he is up to something very bad. I feel it, in my belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (his eyes narrow) Hang on, hang on, you mean to say, you summoned me here THREE DAYS BEFORE EASTER - because of your belly? Mate, if I did this to you three days before Christmas--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to her fairies) Argentina. Priority alert! A batch of bicuspids in Buenos Aires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please. Bunny. Easter is not Christmas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North grabs Bunny's painted egg, casually juggling it in hand as he walks off. Meanwhile Sandy, who is being serve eggnog by a yeti, suddenly notices something high above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North, I, I don't have time for this. I've still got two million eggs to finish up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The moon rises into view, high up in the ceiling; its ray light begin to shine brightly through as they cascade dow the walls of the globe room.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: No matter how much you paint, is still egg! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 11.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy points to the moon unsuccessfully to get the others attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, mate, I'm dealing with perishables. Right. You've got all year to prepare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to her fairies) Pittsburg, boy eight, two molars. Saltwater taffy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy puts his fingers in his mouth to whistle, a silent musical note forming above his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are rabbits always so nervous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And why are you always such a blowhard!

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (to her fairies) Ontario, sector nine: five canines, two molars, and fourteen incisors. Is that all in one house?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy waves a sand flag above his head, pointing and jump up and down as the moonlight continues to fill the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (turning his attention) Tooth! Can't you see we're trying to argue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, not all of us get to work one night a year. Am I right, Sandy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy tries to signal with a golden arrow, pointing towar the ceiling, but to no avail as the others continue their bickering. Sandy thinks Tooth has noticed for a split second, but then -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to her fairies) San Diego, sector two! Five incisors, a bicuspid and a really loose molar on stand-by. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 12.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, mate, Pitch went out with the dark ages. We made sure of that - remember?

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I know it was him. We have serious situation!

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Well, I've got a serious situation with some eggs.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hey, I hate to interrupt the, "We work so hard once a year club" but could we concentrate on the matter--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy can't take it anymore, grabs an elf by his hat, and vigorously shakes it's bell. The other Guardians are fina silenced and all turn to look at Sandy, who points up, a crescent moon forming above his head. The dizzy elf stagg away. Finally the others turn to see the shaft of moonlig as it concentrates on the circle between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aah! Man in Moon! Sandy, why didn't you say something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy gives him a deadpan stare, Dreamsand smoke shoots o his ears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Man in Moon) It's been a long time old friend! What is big news?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone looks to the center of the intense spot of moonlight, the light ebbs away, leaving a dark spot --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- which resolves into the shadowed silhouette of PITCH. Guardians look on, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North pats his belly and gives Bunny a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (back up to the moon) Manny...what must we do? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In answer, the shadow of Pitch disappears and the circle moonlight intensifies and SHRINKS, concentrating further illuminating an ORNATE SYMBOL on the floor, at the center their circle. The symbol rises out of the ground revealin large gem at the head of a pillar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, guys, you know what this means?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The moons light suddenly refracts through the gem casting light all over the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's choosing a new Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Must be big deal! Manny thinks we need help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when do we need help?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wonder who it's gonna be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Dreamsand Four-Leaf clover forms above Sandy's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe the Leprechaun?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please not the groundhog, please not the groundhog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then A BRIGHT FLASH, a rush of WIND - and a FIGURE resolv over the central pillar: slight, hooded, bearing a famili hooked STAFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mini-Teeth all sigh and swoon as the Guardians stand there, stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, I take it back! The Groundhog's fine! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 14.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (caught admiring Jack) Well, ah, as long he helps to ah...to protect the children, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost!? He doesn't care about children! All he does is freeze water pipes and mess with my egg hunts. Right? He's an irresponsible, selfish...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This stops Bunnymund in his tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost is many things, but he is not a Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we turn toward the face of the hooded figure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hooded figure with a familiar looking staff rests atop Post Office box on the opposite end of the street. The ma touches the staff to the ground, sending a streak of fros across the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A RUSSIAN BOY approaches a water fountain, turns the hand and moves in for a sip. But as he does, the water freezes magically, and the boy's tongue is stuck to the frozen wa His friends can't help but laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (tongue stuck to frozen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aahhhhh...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mail man walks across the street and a PATCH OF ICE magically appears under his feet. He scrambles, and BOOM! lands on his butt. Just behind the man, we see the TRAIL FROST climb up the side of a building. We stay on the fro as it moves up along a rain pipe, and through the windows see... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 15.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A boy try to feed his gold fish, but a layer of ice sudde forms along the water surface and prevents the fish from reaching its food. We move along the side of the building

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A writer in his study sits next to stacks of papers. The window suddenly swings open and a gust of wind sends the pages flying out the window. We move along the building, across clothes lines and power lines as they freeze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We continue to move up, and finally discover the culprit. Jack Frost makes his way atop a cathedral spire and takes the view; the full moon bathes the city in moonlight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, now that, that was fun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey wind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack chuckles as he calls the wind. The trees begin to sw and leaves fly into the air. Jack grabs hold of the spire smiling as the wind blows past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take me home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack lets go and the wind carries him into the air and through the clouds. Night turns to day as Jack flies from one horizon to the other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woooooohoooooooooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack falls through the clouds, smiling, toward the town o Burgess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack continues on down and zooms through the streets. Pedestrians clench their jackets and reach for their hats gusts of wind, snow, and streaks of frost are left in Jac wake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack flies in, and with the wind behind him skates across all too familiar pond. As the wind zips across the pond i knocks a BOOK out of the hands of a little boy walking al this is JAMIE. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 16.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie goes to pick up the book and we get a glimpse of th cover - "THEY'RE OUT THERE! - MYSTERIES, MYTHICAL CREATUR AND THE UNEXPLAINED PHENOMENA." Jack flies into frame and lands beside Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh, that looks interesting. Good book?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly twins CLAUDE and CALEB, come barreling past them rough-housing and laughing as they slam each other into drifts (all the boys are 8).

dialogues.speaker: CLAUDE AND CALEB
dialogues.text: Alright! Yeah! Waahoo! Snooow daaaay!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack calls after the boys...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (goes running after them) Hey guys, wait up! Are you guys coming to the egg hunt Sunday?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, free candy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope we can find the eggs with all this snow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caleb stuffs a handful of snow down his brother's Jacket

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids arrive at the fence of Jamie's house. Jamie open up a secret plank, and heads into his yard. Claude and Ca are still messing with each other. Meanwhile, Jack walks unseen along the top of the fence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you stop! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 17.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, it says here that they found Big Foot hair samples and DNA, in Michigan. That's like, super close!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie arrives at his front gate, sled in hand while SOPHI (Jamie's 2-year-old sister in fairy wings) sits down on t Greyhound as it lies in the yard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Yeti hands North an old large book. North blows off the dust, opens it, and begins clearing his throat. Jack clenches his jaw as he scans the room: The Mini Teeth continue to fawn, Sandy's smiling, Bunny's apathetic, and North looks on with pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack suddenly SLAMS his staff down, sending a blast of FR and WIND across the room. The torches go out and everythi stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What makes you think I want to be a Guardian?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North bursts out in laughter holding the book in his hand then stops and looks to Jack, stone faced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you do! (to the elves) Music!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elves blare the trumpets again. Celebration!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No music! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 34.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The music peters out again. An elf throws his trumpet to ground and storms off. North, displeased, glowers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, this is all very flattering, but ah...you don't want me. You're all hard work and deadlines, and I'm snowballs and fun times. I'm not a Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, that's exactly what I said!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack...I don't think you understand what it is we do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth swoops in and turns Jack's attention to the massive globe behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Each of those lights is a child.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks up at the Globe, taking in the enormity of thi North suddenly moves to Jack's side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A child who believes. And good or bad, naughty or nice, we protect them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth...fingers out of mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We cut back to discover that Tooth is examining Jack's te

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, sorry. They're beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack moves away from the Globe and back toward the center the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, no more wishy-washy! Pitch is out there doing who knows what!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean the Boogeyman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! When Pitch threatens us, he threatens them as well. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 35.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North points to the lights on the globe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the more reason to pick someone more qualified!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pick? You think we pick? No, you were chosen like we were all chosen. By Man in Moon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns and looks to the group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stares, dumbstruck) What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last night, Jack. He chose you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Man in the Moon, he talks to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks up to the skylight, taking in the awesome sigh the moon as it shines down on Earth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, you can not say no. It is destiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is still confused by the news. What does it mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But why, why wouldn't he tell me that himself?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After 300 years this is his answer? To spend eternity like you guys cooped up in some, some hideout thinking of, of new ways to bribe kids? No no, that's not for me. No offense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns to leave, the Guardians are stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How is that not offensive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except for Bunny, who is relieved by this turn and looks the others. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 36.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what I think? I think we just dodged a bullet. I mean, what's this clown know about bringing joy to children anyway?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns back. A little pissed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uhh, you ever hear of a snow day? I know it's no hard-boiled egg, but kids like what I do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But none of 'em believe in you. (leans in to him) Do they? You see, you're invisible, mate. It's like you don't even exist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny! Enough!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence. Jack tries not to look stung by this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, the kangaroo's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The, the what -- what'd you call me? I am not a kangaroo, mate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. And this whole time I thought you were. If you're not a kangaroo, what are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a bunny. The Easter Bunny. People believe in me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy nudges North, who acknowledges the tension in the a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack. Walk with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 37.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and North ride an elevator, bearing the resemblance Christmas ornament, down to the factory floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's nothing personal, North. What you all do, it's just, it's not my thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man in Moon says it is your thing. We will see!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North storms through factory floor, Jack trying to keep u An amazing place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down, wouldja? I've been trying to bust in here for years, I want a good look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (peeved - still rushing) What do you mean, "bust in?"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, don't worry, I never got past the yetis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks over his shoulder; an angry yeti pounds his fi into his palm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rwwarrrrrr.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, hey Phil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep up, Jack! Keep up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North charges ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North's factory is bustling with activity: Yeti's are building toys, moving packages, while Elves are test pilo the various flying toys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jack walks behind North, surveying the factory, a duck suddenly flies over Jack's head. Jack ducks just in time continues after North. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 38.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always thought the elves made the toys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We just let them believe that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks over to see a group of elves eating Christmas ornaments and another electrocuting himself with Christma lights. North smiles and calls to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very nice! Keep up good work!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North continues through the factory floor. He passes a ye putting the finishing touches on a blue toy robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like it. Paint it red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The yeti reacts in dismay as we reveal hundreds of finish blue robots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Step it up, everybody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As North and Jack move to the opposite end of the chamber finally glimpse the orchestrated chaos of the entire workshop, in all it's magic and splendor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack follows North into his office. There are shelves fil with toys. Sketches and prototypes everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North dusts his hands and turns to Jack. His sleeves are rolled. Jack notices that on one of North's forearms is tattooed the word NAUGHTY, and on the other, NICE. North grabs a plate from a nearby elf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fruit cake?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, no, thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North hurls it - crash! A pause as North looks at Jack. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 39.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now we get down to tacks of brass!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tacks of brass?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As North cracks his knuckles, Jack stands silent. The win suddenly slams North's office door behind them. Jack look to the door, it locks itself, and he turns back. North mo in close to Jack, backing him up against the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you, Jack Frost? What is your center?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North pokes Jack in the chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My center?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If Man in Moon chose you to be a Guardian, you must have something very special inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North stands up straight and begins to stroke his beard a gives Jack a curious look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North is standing in front of a shelf of Russian nesting dolls. One is carved to look like North himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here. This is how you see me, no? Very big, intimidating. But if you get to know me a little-- (hands the doll to Jack) Well, go on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack gives North a curious look, then sets down his staff He twists the doll in half, and inside is another carved North doll, this one is a more typical Santa Claus - red cheeked and cheery.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are downright jolly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, but not just jolly... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 40.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dolls get progressively smaller as he twists them ope all versions of North, but all slightly different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am also mysterious. (twist - smaller doll) And fearless. (twist - smaller doll) And caring. And at my center...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twist. As North approaches, Jack looks down and drops the final Russian doll into the palm of North's hand. It's th size of a jelly bean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a tiny wooden baby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look closer. What do you see?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack holds it up to examine it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have big eyes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Big eyes. Very big. Because they are full! Of wonder! That is my center. It is what I was born with. Eyes that have always seen the wonder in everything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North raises his hands, and the toys on the shelves sudde spring to life. Jack-in-the-boxes pop, toy trains speed around the room, soldiers march about, toy planes fly overhead. An elf gets carried aloft by a balloon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A flying toy plane glides by and we follow it as it makes way around the room. A Christmas tree is ablaze with brig lights. Two double doors suddenly open as the flying car enters the factory floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eyes that see lights in the trees, and magic in the air!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it crosses the frame, dozens of other toys are now fly around the massive chamber. It's a truly magical moment. North now stands outside his office, with Jack at his sid

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This wonder is what I put into the world, and what I protect in children.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 41.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is what makes me a Guardian. It is my center. What is yours?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks down into his open palm, the wooden baby stare back at him. North closes Jack's hand. They exchange a lo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, something suddenly jets past a window outside. Almo simultaneously, Bunny and Sandman come running down the hallway toward North and Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have a problem, mate! Trouble at the Tooth Palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North shoves open a set of double doors, followed closely Bunny, Sandy, and Jack. Several Yeti's rush by as they prepare the hangar for launch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boys, ship shape. As soon as impossible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North, North! I told you, I'm not going with you guys! There is no way I'm climbing into some rickety old...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly: the SOUND of POUNDING HOOVES. BEASTLY SNORTING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SANTA'S INCREDIBLE SLEIGH comes into view. It's a huge, shiny, tricked out, jaw-dropping hot-rod of a sled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is understandably gob-smacked, so much so that he al gets knocked over by one of the reindeer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 42.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Moi deti, moi deti. Quiet, quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sleigh comes to a standstill as the Guardians prepare climb inside. Several Yetis are still running around maki last minute preparations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, one ride, but that's it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack jumps aboard. North smiles knowingly, and climbs inside. Sandy hops up into the back seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone loves the sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North grabs the reigns, wrapping them around his arms. He turns to see Bunnymund standing there, frozen and unnerve

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny, what are you waiting for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think my tunnels might be faster, mate. And um, and safer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, get in. (hoists Bunnymund up) Buckle up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny desperately looks around his seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, where are the bloody seatbelts?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was just expression!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North turns to one of the Yetis .

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are we ready?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Yeti throws his hands up in a fit shaking his head no

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good! Let's go! Clear! (cracks the reigns) Hyah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 43.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sleigh is off. Elves and yetis scatter out of its pat Sandy, Bunny, and Jack fly back into their seats. Bunny clutches the edge of his, terrified. Jack can't help but laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sleigh heads down a luge-like track. North and Jack a enjoying the ride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohhhhhh no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North cracks the reigns, the sleigh plummets, an almost vertical drop. Sandy grins calmly. Jack loves this. Bunnymund - not so much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down, slow down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North pulls a lever, kicking the sleigh into overdrive. H looks back as the sleigh enters a corkscrew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you like the loopty loops!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope you like carrots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT as the sleigh reaches the bottom of the ramp, a shoots upwards, launching them into bright blue sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North, reins in hand, leans into the wind as the reindeer climb higher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Klasno! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 44.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, in his element, leaps up onto the rear of the sleig watch the North Pole fade into the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunnymund peaks off the side of the sleigh, then leans ba and holds on for dear life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Bunny--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny turns to see Jack standing on the back edge of the sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check out this view--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is SWEPT OFF the sleigh and disappears! Bunny gasps horror and looks over the side...only to see Jack loungin the sleigh's skid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awww...you do care.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, rack off you bloody show pony!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny glowers as Jack makes his way back into the sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on everyone, I know a shortcut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh strewth, I knew we should have taken the tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North holds a snow globe up to his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I say, Tooth Palace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An image of the Tooth Palace appears inside the snowglobe North throws the globe into the air and a giant vortex op

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyah! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 45.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A surreal light surrounds the sleigh as it hits HYPERDRIV and gets sucked through the snow-globe portal with a WHOO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sleigh suddenly comes out of HYPERDRIVE at the outski of the Tooth Palace. Streaks of black rapidly approaching

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly our heroes find themselves in the midst of mayhe as hundreds of Nightmares and terrified Tooth Fairies jet past. It's like a meteor storm. North yanks the reins, an the sleigh veers sharply, dodging the oncoming Nightmares

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are they!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy and Bunny duck the onslaught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack now sees that the Nightmares are actually GULPING DO the fleeing fairies and flying off with them. It's chaos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're taking the tooth fairies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks up to see a lone fairy with a Nightmare snappi at its heels. Jack leaps into the air and rescues it befo the Nightmare can snatch it away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack lands back in the sleigh. He opens his hand to revea Baby Tooth, who's shaking with fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey little Baby Tooth, you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Baby Tooth nods, North steers the sleigh forward throu the storm toward the entrance of Tooth's Palace. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 46.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A vast chamber supported by pillars containing millions o tiny wooden deposit boxes from floor to ceiling. North sp a Nightmare up ahead and hands Jack the reigns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, take over!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, though surprised, quickly grabs the reigns and smil as he snaps them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North readies his sword and SLICES the Nightmare in half

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SEVERAL TOOTH BOXES spill out of the split Nightmare and down into the sleigh at the Guardians' feet. The Nightmar disintegrates into black sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're stealing the teeth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy looks at his hands and sees the Nightmare sand take shape and drift away. He and Bunny exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians turn -- they're headed straight for a pilla

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack pulls the reins --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- the sleigh nearly misses the pillar and skids to a rou stop on a platform. They see Tooth up above.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth! Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth is flying around, visibly frustrated. This is bad. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 47.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They, they took my fairies! And the teeth! All of them! Everything is gone! Everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only then does it hit her. Tooth's wings drop in defeat. She's completely lost amidst the devastation. The Guardia rush to comfort her. Jack stays behind as Baby Tooth pops out from the hood of his tunic and flies over toward Toot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh thank goodness! One of you is alright!

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I have to say, this is very, very exciting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch's voice echoes across the open chamber. They look u see Pitch, standing high above them with a satisfied smil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Big Four, all in one place. I'm a little star-struck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you like my show on the globe, North? Got you all together, didn't I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth darts after Pitch, but he escapes into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch, you have got thirty seconds to return my fairies!

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Or what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth follows the sound of Pitch's voice and finds him ne one of her tooth box columns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll stick a quarter under my pillow?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you doing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I want what you have. To be believed in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack takes this in. Pitch moves along the walls and shado of the chamber and emerges from behind a column. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 48.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe I'm tired of hiding under beds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe that's where you belong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, go suck an egg, rabbit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny looks down past the edge of the platform to find Pi upside down, staring him in the face. Pitch disappears ag

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Hang on, is that...Jack Frost?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when are you all so chummy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns and sees Pitch standing in the middle of a col

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A neutral party. Then I'm going to ignore you. But, you must be used to that by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch! You shadow sneaking rat- bag! Come here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny goes after Pitch, but he disappears and reemerges o opposite column. Tooth spots him, grabs one of Bunny's boomerangs and flies at Pitch in a rage...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch looks at Tooth with a smile and before she can reac him, a huge Nightmare darts out of hiding and rears up at her. Tooth falls back. Baby Tooth hides in Jack's tunic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Hey, easy, girl. Easy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch draws a wisp of black sand from Onyx's mane, twirls in his palm, and turns toward Sandy. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 49.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look familiar, Sandman? Took me a while to perfect this little trick. Turning dreams into Nightmares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch notices the shocked Guardians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't be nervous, it only riles them up more. They smell fear you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What fear? Of you!? No one's been afraid of you since the Dark Ages!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch's eyes flash with anger. But then he smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, the Dark Ages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A parent and her two children, huddled around a campfire, scream as a shadow, resembling Pitch, washes over them. I makes its way up the side of a mountain to reveal Pitch, smiling as he stares up at the moon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone frightened. Miserable. Such happy times for me. Oh, the power I wielded!

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: But then the Man in the Moon chose you to replace my fear with your wonder and light!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North's sleigh flies in front of the moon. Tooth and her fairies flit by while SANDY's Dreamsand dances across the and Bunny leaps across rooftops.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Lifting their hearts! And giving them hope! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 50.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch, thinner and weaker than he is now, slips back into shadows after children run through him while playing in t streets, laughing as they go.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, everyone wrote me off as just a bad dream! "Oh, there's nothing to be afraid of! There's no such thing as the Boogeyman!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch leans toward the Guardians, showing nothing but contempt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well that's all about to change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SOUND behind Pitch: one of the COLUMNS of the Palace be to crack and crumble, as if decaying. Tooth is stunned...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh look, it's happening already.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth's eyes widen in shock.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Children are waking up and realizing the Tooth Fairy never came.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lifting pillows and finding their BABY TEETH still there.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I mean such a little thing, but to a child...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PULL OUT from the last VIGNETTE, all the way out of TOOTH WIDE-OPEN EYE, and BACK TO SCENE. Jack, mystified, moves closer to Tooth as the palace continues to crumble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They, they don't believe in me anymore. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 51.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't they tell you, Jack? It's great being a Guardian -- but there's a catch. If enough kids stop believing, everything your friends protect - wonder, hopes and dreams - it all goes away. And little by little, so do they.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's realizes now the magnitude of Pitch's plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No Christmas, or Easter, or little fairies that come in the night. There will be nothing. But fear and darkness and me! It's your turn not to be believed in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny throws his boomerangs at Pitch, who quickly ducks o of the way as they fly around the chamber columns. Pitch then jumps onto the back of Onyx down into the depths of Palace. The Guardians dive after him, followed by Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny grabs a set of egg bombs and launches them at Pitch exploding seconds before Pitch hits the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians land --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth, deflated, sits on the ground with an empty tooth b in her hands. Baby Tooth, resting on a nearby broken toot box, looks to Tooth with concern. Jack walks up and crouc down alongside Tooth.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Okay, alright I admit it, you were right about Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: This is one time I wish I was wrong. But he will pay. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 52.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, about the fairies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not her bubbly self) You should've seen them. They put up such a fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why would Pitch take the teeth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not the teeth he wanted. It's the memories inside them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth leads Jack across the pond, the water freezing unde his feet as he walks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why we collect the teeth, Jack. They hold the most important memories of childhood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth directs him to a MURAL, which illustrates this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My fairies and I watch over them and when someone needs to remember what's important, we help them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack takes a second to admire the immense beauty of the m before him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We had everyone's here. Yours too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My memories?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From when you were young. Before you became Jack Frost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, I wasn't anyone before I was Jack Frost. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course you were. We were all someone before we were chosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should've seen Bunny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I told you never to mention that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, confused, is trying to process all this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That night at the pond...I just, why I assumed...Are you saying, are you saying I had a life before that? With a home? And a family?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really don't remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's expression says it all. Finally the key to all his questions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All these years, and the answers were right here. If I find my memories, then I'll know why I'm here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to show me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, using his control of the wind, lifts up off the gro and flies across the pond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I...I can't, Jack. Pitch has them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack floats down onto a rock, overlooking the Guardians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we have to get them back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a patch of Tooth's feathers fall out, and disappears. The Guardians eyes fill with worry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is stricken. He looks back -- the ancient MURAL begi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The children. We're too late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! No! No such thing as too late!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. Idea!! HAHH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gleeful. The others look at each other as if he's nu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will collect the teeth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We get teeth! Children keep believing in you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're talking seven continents! Millions of kids!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me break! You know how many toys I deliver in one night?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And eggs I hide in one day?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North turns to Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Jack, if you help us, we will get you your memories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks to Tooth, who gives him a reassuring smile. Sa gives to enthusiastic thumbs up while Bunny groans. Jack looks back to North with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We transition to the SHANGHAI SKYLINE as North BOOMS up o of a chimney, dashing along the rooftops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quickly! Quickly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North BOOMS down another chimney as Bunnymund races into a rooftop away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here we go, here we go...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack zips into view, calling out to Bunny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hop to it rabbit, I'm five teeth ahead!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah right, look, I'd tell you to stay outta my way, but really what's the point -- because you won't be able to keep up anyway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that a challenge, cottontail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you don't wanna race a rabbit, mate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As we pan across the rooftops, BOOM! North bursts up out a nearby chimney.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A race? Is it a race??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North jumps into one chimney, then shoots out of another across the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is going to be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North disappears down yet another chimney only to emerge a bang out the top of another. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 56.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As North leaps out of frame, Tooth darts into view, in hummingbird overdrive, dazzled by the lights and traffic. Baby Tooth struggles to keep up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four bicuspids over there! An incisor two blocks east! Is that a molar? They're EVERYWHERE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth, overwhelmed, jets off without paying attention and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THOOMP -- she smacks into a TOOTHPASTE BILLBOARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack jumps up to the billboard to check on her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine...sorry, it's been a really long time since I've been out in the field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long is a long time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, four hundred forty years...give or take.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth jerks to attention: suddenly her VIEW ZOOMS IN thru LITTLE GIRL'S BEDROOM WINDOW: a tiny GLOW under her pillo marks a freshly planted TOOTH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth gasps and her eyes go wide -- she FLIES to the wind excited. Jack reacts, looks to Baby Tooth: it's gonna be long night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, cocksure, arrives outside an open window. His smile suddenly disappears when he sees a RABBIT HOLE open up in bedroom floor and Bunny hops out. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 57.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny, now holding the tooth in his paw, turns to Jack an laughs. Jack, not amused, zaps Bunny with burst of frost from his staff.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Aaahhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians fly over a Middle Eastern city in North's sleigh as the full moon lights up the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North pulls TWO teeth, one with each hand: TWINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yipa!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny pulls out his hand from under a pillow revealing SEVERAL TEETH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jackpot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull out wider to reveal HOCKEY TROPHIES, POSTERS and PARAPHERNALIA EVERYWHERE. Bunny grins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you're a bit of a brumby, hey mate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North stands at the side of a boy's bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is piece of pie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He falls into a rabbit hole, finding himself face to face with Bunny. He growls. SANDMAN enters and takes the boy's tooth for himself. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 58.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my tooth! Sandy! Sandy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack parkours between two buildings and into a window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack flies in through the window when suddenly, a rabbit appears. As Jack disappears through the rabbit hole, Bunn appears through an adjacent hole laughing to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth reaches under a pillow and pulls out a Tooth with a mouse attached to the other end. Baby Tooth tackles the mouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa! Take it easy there, champ! He's one of us! Part of the European division. (to the mouse) Ca va?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mouse gestures back angrily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North and the Guardians, riding North's sleigh, exit a wormhole. North laughs as they fly over the city.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny pulls a note from under a pillow instead of a tooth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The note shows an arrow, pointing toward the window. He looks up to the window: North holds up a tooth as he grin then leaps off the ledge laughing. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 59.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny lands on a rooftop, holding a tooth in his paw, and proud of himself. Then, Bunny hears the sound of ice and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crikey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --and disappears from view. Bunny is now sliding down the side of a roof on a sheet of ice. Jack grabs the tooth fr Bunny's paw as he slides past and holds it high in the ai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack holds up the tooth, but within moments a hand snatch it. Jack looks to see Sandy waving `bye-bye' as he flies on his Dreamsand cloud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North dances across a rooftop and quickly drops into a chimney to enter a house -- we DROP FAST THROUGH THE ROOF CEILING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...to see BUNNY'S PAW as it LIGHTS THE FIREPLACE. Bunny grins demonically in the firelight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haha! Ho, ho, ho!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large burst of fire shoots out the top of a distant chimney.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Ahh! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, North, Sandy, and Bunny stand proudly. Each one of them revealing their own bag filled with teeth to Tooth. Tooth is overwhelmed by their collective effort.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! You guys collect teeth and leave gifts as fast as my fairies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their eyes widen and Tooth is suddenly panic stricken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys have been leaving gifts, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of the group turns to each other, sinking their heads and biting their lips in embarrassment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians stand in line, waiting their turn to put do bills into a coin dispenser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Baby Tooth puts a COIN under a pillow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Now Jack puts a coin under a pillow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - North's hand pulls a Tooth from under a pillow. He replaces it pair of CANDY CANES and a few COINS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Bunny stomps his feet and falls through a rabbit hole t reveal a pair of Easter Eggs atop a child's bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: - Sandy walks through a doggy door with a coin in his han In shock, he sees North laughing while arranging Christma decorations in the child's bedroom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A young boy, holding a stuffed animal and a sippy cup to mouth, looks out his bedroom window. The Guardians, cast moonlight, bound across the adjacent rooftops. The young boy, dumbfounded, drops his juice. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians fly across the night sky only to disappear through a snowglobe portal. Nearby, a Nightmare observes the sleigh vanishes. It leaps off the roof, through a dra and down into the sewers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SPY NIGHTMARE flies down into a dark cavernous space. Large STEEL CAGES hang all around and trapped inside are MINI TEETH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmare heads toward Pitch, standing at his own GLO which is conspicuously covered in lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights...why aren't they going out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmare approaches from behind and lets out a soft whiney; Pitch stiffens at the news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're collecting the teeth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The MINI TEETH perk up at this, and start twittering excitedly, which echoes throughout the lair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh pipe down, or I'll stuff a pillow with you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Mini Teeth begin to settle down. PITCH looks at the Nightmare, frustrated, and scowls. The Nightmare winces a disperses into tiny particles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A strand of NIGHTMARE SAND from the Nightmare twirls in t air, and Pitch twists it with his fingers, turning it int crude image of the SANDMAN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fine, have your last hurrah. For tomorrow, all you pathetic scrambling will be for nothing. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 62.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he crushes the image in his fist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cool looking ROBOT TOY rests on Jamie's bedside table. Jamie is sound asleep in bed. A smile across his face reveals the recently formed gap between his teeth.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Left central incisor, knocked out in a freak sledding accident. I wonder how that could have happened, Jack?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack laughs as he looks at JAMIE'S DRAWING of himself dur the SNOWBALL FIGHT on the wall. He's midair, blasting his friends with snowballs. He smiles and then turns to Tooth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kids, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He watches as Tooth reaches under the pillow. She hovers over Jamie as he stirs in his sleep. A dreamy smile comes over her as she gazes down at the sleeping boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was always the part I liked most - seeing the kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did I ever stop doing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat; Jack sees how much it means to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a little different up close, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth gives him a look: he's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for being here, Jack. I wish I had known about your memory, I could've helped you. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 63.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, well, look let's just get you taken care of. Then it's Pitch's turn, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sudden COMMOTION. They both turn to the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here you are!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North, carrying a large sack over his shoulder, struggles climb in through the small window. Sandman and Baby Tooth climb in after. Everybody whispers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, what gives slowpokes!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie is still sound asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How you feeling, Toothy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Believed in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haha! That's what I want to hear.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh I see how it is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny comes in through a rabbit hole in the floorboards.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All working together to make sure the rabbit gets last place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North now holds his index fingers up to his lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I need help to beat a bunny? Check it out, Peter Cottontail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack lifts up his sack of teeth. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 64.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You call that a bag of choppers? (lifting larger sack) Now that's a bag of choppers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gentlemen! Gentlemen! This is about Tooth. It's not a competition! But if it was -- (reveals even larger sack) I win. YEEEEEHAAAHH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he strikes a Russian dancing pose as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a bright circle of light is cast on the Guardian

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Santa Claus?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all turn slowly to see Jamie sitting up in bed, hold a flashlight, wide awake and beaming in disbelief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Easter Bunny?...Sandman...The Tooth Fairy! I knew you'd come!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surprise!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We came!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can see us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie looks around, amazed, he sees everyone but Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhh! You guys, he's still awake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy! Knock him out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all look to him, scandalized. Jamie looks concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 65.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the Dreamsand, ya gumbies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then Jamie's GREYHOUND rises up into frame, fully awa its nostrils flaring at the scent he's picked up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, stop that's the Easter Bunny. What are you doing, Abbey? Down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog is nose to nose with Bunnymund.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, nobody panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But that's a um, that's a greyhound. Do you know what greyhounds do to rabbits?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's a pretty safe bet he's never met a rabbit like me -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Sandy forms a Dreamsand baseball, Jack rolls his ey and notices an alarm clock on the bedside table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six foot one, nerves of steel, master of tai-chi and the ancient

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack can't resist: he reaches over stealthily and SETS OF THE ALARM CLOCK with his staff. RRRRRIIIIING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crikey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny is off like a shot, the greyhound right on his tail running laps in the small room, the dog barking like craz

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! Sit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy, amused, makes a Dreamsand baseball to stop the dog but bobbles it as the dog brushes past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Down girl, down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others stand out of the way as Bunny and the dog run the walls and over the bed. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 66.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Tooth tries to silence the alarm clock, Jack can barel contain his laughter. Sandy takes aim as Bunny and the do run circles around him--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy, Sandy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dog jumps past North, knocking him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah!
