dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Sandy winds up, the dog suddenly SMACKS right into him The Dreamsand goes flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, this is not proper Tooth Fairy behavior!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North ducks out of the way as the Dreamsand sails toward The Dreamsand baseball smacks Tooth right in the face and explodes into golden dust. Tooth and her fairy fall to th ground as a golden tooth takes shape above their heads.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Streams of Dreamsand make their way around the room.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.C.)
dialogues.text: Ah, this thing's rabid! Get this dingo off me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny gets a whiff of the golden sand. The image of a car quickly takes shape in front of his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUD! Bunny falls over asleep. THUD! So does the dog. North tries to scramble out of the way, but there's no es in this tiny room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Candy canes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He teeters for a moment as Dreamsand candy canes appear before him, then falls like a giant Sequoia, landing - TH on the end of Jamie's bed, which sends Jamie catapulting through the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoaaaaaaaaaa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luckily he lands -- OOF! -- in Sandy's arms. He starts to wake up AGAIN, but Sandy is there with a fistful of sand BOOF! -- and Jamie too is out cold. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and Sandy look down at the sleeping boy, relieved. T they look around -- a heap of sleeping, snoring bodies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoops...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny is snuggled up next to North. A carrot and candy canes, made of Dreamsand, hold hands as they dance above Bunny and North's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack comes down off the dresser and turns to Sandy, who h put Jamie back in bed. Sandy lifts North's arm and lets g it's completely limp and falls flat. Sandy smiles at Jack who chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I really wish I had a camera right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy eyes suddenly widen. There's a Nightmare behind Jac Jack turns to see A NIGHTMARE staring through the window. Without hesitation, Jack jumps out the window after it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy, c'mon! We can find Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy pauses for a moment, then follows Jack's lead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sleeping Guardians are where we left them. Jamie's bedroom door opens, and Sophie toddles in. She takes in t scene, amused. She toddles over to North, giggling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pokes at his rotund belly. Then she notices something She reaches into his pocket and pulls out a snow globe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks over to see the Easter Bunny, sound asleep on t floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny! Hop! Hop! Hop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the snow globe lights up. Sophie's eyes widen as she looks at the beautiful vista inside the globe. It's Bunny's warren.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes the globe and toddles off for the door, when sh trips - again - and the snow globe smashes on the floor. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOMF!! A flash of LIGHT. She looks up to see a magical portal open in front of her. A GUST WIND comes blowing ou of the portal. Sophie giggles, and toddles through the portal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North's bleary EYES pop open mid-snore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whuh-huh...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWO NIGHTMARES zigzag along the rooftops, searching for victims. Jack, loving the chase, is in hot pursuit with Sandy, who's riding along on a streak of Dreamsand--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wahooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haha! Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Nightmares splits off, angling for a BEDROOM WINDOW. Sandy calmly follows--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmare flies right through the WINDOW and SANDY do the same -- the OTHER ONE angles up over the house's ROOF evade Jack, who PARKOURS over the roof after it--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waaahahoooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the WINDOWS BELOW, FLASHES OF GOLDEN and SICKLY G LIGHT race through the house as Sandy battles the Nightma

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmares and Jack ZOOM away from the house just as Sandy and the FIRST NIGHTMARE blast out of the window, Sa wrestling it until -- POOF! It explodes into golden DREAMSAND which he quickly transforms into a Sting Ray fo him to ride-- Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack flies through town on the heels of the Nightmare. It makes a sharp turn down an alleyway and Jack is quick to follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmare then veers up the wall of the alley and ont ROOFTOP. Jack whips a blast from his staff and HITS the Nightmare before it disappears from view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HAAAH! I got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack jumps up onto the roof and prods the frozen Nightmar with his staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy! Sandy, did you see that?!? Look at this thing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack can barely contain his excitement as he calls out to Sandy -- but suddenly Pitch lurches out from behind an ai conditioning unit on the rooftop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frost?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack blasts a WAVE OF FROST across the rooftop, but Pitch easily dodges it, reappearing behind Jack on the adjoinin rooftop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, for a "neutral party" you spend an awful lot of time with those weirdos.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't your fight, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's eyes narrow. He holds out his staff, ready to stri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You made it my fight when you stole those teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch regards him curiously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Teeth? Why do you care about the teeth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he notices something and turns to find Sandy calmly standing on the rooftop next to him. Pitch quickly sidesteps, moving away from Sandy. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now this is who I'm looking for--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Pitch can finish a DREAMSAND STREAM whips around h forcing him to duck and dodge Sandy's sudden attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa--??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch DISPERSES a stream of NIGHTMARE SAND, turning it in gigantic sickle and swings it back at Sandy. Jack ducks, avoiding injury as Sandy's pushed back against a ledge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy quickly grabs Pitch with another DREAMSAND STREAM a yanks him off his feet, slamming him repeatedly against t tops of the buildings until finally throwing him off the rooftop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch bounces off the ground as he crashes into an EMPTY STREET. As Sandy dusts his hands and calmly steps off the rooftop to follow, Jack looks on, astonished.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remind me not to get on your bad side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch shakes off the crash, trying to back up as Sandy touches down and moves toward him, Jack following. Pitch cowers on the ground in fear as they approach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks up, pleading) Okay, easy! You can't blame me for trying, Sandy. You don't know what it's like to be weak and hated. It was stupid of me to mess with your dreams. So I'll tell you what-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy continues forward, grim faced...but suddenly Pitch stops cowering and stands up. His tone changes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can have `em back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Jack and Sandy can react, a Nightmare shoots up through a storm drain as several other Nightmares gather the alley behind him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and Sandy look around as hundreds of Nightmares desc from the surrounding rooftops to encircle them. This does look good. Jack, worried, looks to Sandy and mutters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You take the ones on the left, I'll take the ones on the right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Pitch rises up from off the ground as Onyx tak shape underneath him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch grabs onto Onyx's mane as it snorts and snarls. He then leans forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch's army of Nightmares begin to charge. Then suddenly the sound of BELLS and REINDEER echo in the distance--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NORTH'S SLEIGH bursts through the clouds. Jack and Pitch look up into the sky as it circles overhead. The sleigh turns toward Pitch, only to fly a few feet over his head. Pitch turns as it passes over him, slightly confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North's asleep at the wheel, along with Bunny and Tooth. Suddenly, the sleigh clips one of its skis as it flies ov City Hall, jolting North to attention.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny awakes with a fright from a bad a dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get outta my warren! (realizes he's awake now) Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still battling Nightmares, Sandy propels himself and Jack into the air with a stream of Dreamsand and launches Jack away from the Nightmares. Jack quickly orients himself an knocks an oncoming Nightmare with his staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth quickly jumps off the side of the sleigh toward Jac and Sandy. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, knocks away a few more Nightmares with his staff, a looks up. Tooth suddenly flies into view through the swar of Nightmares, slicing them apart with her wings, causing them to EXPLODE into BLACK SAND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch gives a signal and leaps into the air, leading anot wave of Nightmares after the Guardians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back in the sleigh, Bunny jumps out and lands on a nearby roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny quickly tosses his boomerang which disintegrates ev Nightmare in its path. Bunny catches the returning boomerang, leaps off the roof, and grabs the skids of the sleigh as it passes by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North stands, drawing both his scimitars, and dices the oncoming Nightmares to bits as they attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha. Ha. Ha. Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack heads back to the sleigh by dodging two Nightmares a they attack. As he continues his descent, Jack is suddenl blind sided by another Nightmare, which knocks the staff his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a moment, Jack is in a state of panic as he finds him in free fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaaaaaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He finally manages to hook onto the staff, control his descent, and land on the sleigh as it flies past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (coolly, to Jack) You might want to duck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack DUCKS as a Nightmare rears up behind him, but one of Bunny's BOOMERANGS blasts through it and zips back to Bun waiting paw. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy high up in he clouds, does his best to contain the OF NIGHTMARES that are swirling around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch rises from behind a group of Nightmares. He stretch his arms as an ARROW of NIGHTMARE SAND forms behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and the Guardians watch as more Nightmares speed awa join their herd. Sandy looks overwhelmed by the onslaught

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta help Sandy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North cracks the reigns, turns the sleigh, and heads towa the swirling cloud of yellow and black sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch takes aim and releases the arrow. It flies through air and into SANDY'S back, exploding on impact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians look on, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack leaps ahead of the sleigh and flies toward Sandy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy feels the shock and turns around. A patch of blackn starts slowly spreading across his body. Pitch laughs as and Sandy lock eyes. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hahahahaha!...Don't fight the fear, little man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians continue to speed toward Sandy, but Nightma begin colliding with the sleigh, slowing their progress.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry, hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch relishes this moment of triumph.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say sweet dreams, but there aren't any left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy, his eyes filled with terror, falls to his knees as patch of blackness continues to spread.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack presses on, trying to reach Sandy as fast as he can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy stands up, accepting his fate, and closes his eyes he and his Dreamsand cloud are consumed by the writhing blackness of the Nightmare sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Horrified, clenches his staff as he flies toward Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...NOOOOOO!!!! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 75.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy's gone. His beautiful Golden Dreamsand, now black, merges with the rest of Pitch's Nightmare sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is beyond delighted. His plan actually worked!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch then notices Jack flying towards him, glowing energ emanating from Jack's staff. Pitch raises his hands and sends a massive wave of Nightmares toward Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians are stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack quickly realizes that's he's in over his head as the attacking Nightmares begin to overtake him. He's engulfed Nightmares and there is nothing but silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch looks on with a smile until a bolt of lightning suddenly erupts from within the writhing black sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhhhh!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A gust of wind blows past Pitch, quickly followed by a massive wave of ice and frost that rockets back up the st of Nightmare sand toward him, culminating in an explosion ice and snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack free falls back to Earth, unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth quickly rescues him and sets him back down in the sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, how did you do that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I, I didn't know I could.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch pulls himself laboriously from the mud and weeds amongst the trees where he's crash-landed, oddly, he seem delighted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up to see a BRIGHT GLOW -- North's SNOWGLOBE POR The sleigh zooms into it and it WINKS OUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch shakes the FROST from his arms as scores of Nightma swarm behind Pitch, regrouping after the blast. Pitch, at the center, seems as pleased as can be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally! Someone who knows how to have a little FUN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in the midst of a somber ceremony, marking the pass of Sandy. Burning candles line the perimeter of Sandy's stone emblem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth sets down a candle and stands shoulder to shoulder North and Bunny. The three hold hands in solace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ringing of somber bells can be heard echoing througho the chamber, as we reveal the elves and a yeti ringing th elf bells as part of a ceremonial dirge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, facing a window, FROSTS OVER THE GLASS with his fin to form a symbol of Sandy. North slowly walks up behind h Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 77.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack remains still, his eyes fixed on the image of Sandy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just, I wish I could've done something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Done something? Jack, you stood up to Pitch. You saved us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Sandy wo--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (putting his hand on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would be proud of what you did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack pulls back his hoodie and stands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know who you were in your past life, but in this life you are Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But how can I know who I am, until I find out who I was?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will. I feel it, in my belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and North approach the globe which is losing lights an alarming rate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look how fast they're going out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fear. He's tipped the balance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack drifts up closer the globe. He looks at the lights going out, then back to the Guardians. There's a nervous tension in the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (twirling his boomerang) Hey, buck up ya sad-sacks. Come on! We can still turn this around!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easter is tomorrow and I need your help. I say we pull out all the stops and we get those little lights flickering again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A massive wooden door swings open; North leads Jack and t Guardians through the doorway, into an elevator, and thro his factory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny is right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As much as it pains me to say old friend, this time Easter is more important than Christmas!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Did everyone hear that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We must hurry to the Warren. Everyone, to the sleigh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ohh no, mate. My warren my rules. Buckle up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny directs the groups attention to the ground. He taps his foot and a rabbit hole opens up under their feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shostakovich!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians plummet through Bunny's tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, Bunny and Tooth arrive gracefully in the warren's antechamber, while North and the yetis comes to a crashin halt. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Buckle up." Is very funny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome to the warren--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny stands before them when suddenly, he shifts his attention. He turns, his ears perk up and his nose sniffs the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's amiss. A faint scream begins to echo from wit the depths of one of Bunny's egg tunnels. Tiny eggs come scuttling out from the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny grabs his boomerang, North draws his sword, and Jac readies his staff as the sounds of booming footsteps, screams, and the rustling of foliage grows louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny begins to charge toward the tunnel. At his side are the Guardians, yetis, and sentinel eggs all bellowing the loudest battle cries until...Sophie bursts out. All momen comes to a halt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They immediately withdraw their weapons, mildly embarrass Sophie giggles and immediately runs after one of the elve

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elf, elf, elf!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is SHE doing HERE!!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North looks down at his coat pocket - ooops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, snow globe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Crikey! Somebody do something!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't look at me, I'm invisible, remember? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie giggles as she drags the elf by the bell atop its uniform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Bunny. I bet she's a fairy fan. (flies up to Sophie) It's okay little one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Awww! You know what, I got something for you. Here it is. (she pulls something out) Look at all the pretty teeth with little blood and gum on them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie runs away screaming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood and gums? When was the last time you guys actually hung out with kids?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Sophie is running around the warren, exploring playing. Sophie pokes her head into a small tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peek-a-boo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are very busy bringing joy to children! We don't have time...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...for children.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack walks toward her, forming a SNOWFLAKE, which floats toward Sophie. She tries to grab at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If one little kid can ruin Easter, then...we're in worse shape than I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie follows the snowflake as Jack leads it over to Bun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weeee! Weee, weee, weee! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The snowflake lands on Bunny's nose and his concerns sudd seem to slip away. Jack's magic is taking affect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close up on a flower, that opens to reveal an egg. The eg stands up wobbly on its spindly little legs. We pull out reveal Sophie and Bunny's faces looking on, Sophie amazed Bunny proud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna paint some eggs? Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on then!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull out further to reveal a massive stone spire, cove in moss, as thousands of unpainted eggs stream down the s of it toward a green meadow. North and Jack stand in the midst of it all, slack-jawed, as the eggs rush towards th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rimsky Korsakov! That's a lot of eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, how much time do we have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weeeeee!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woooohoooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny hops into view, Sophie clinging to his back smiling leading a huge mass of eggs down a wide PATH. As he passe FLOWERS BLOOM on either side in his wake, BLASTING the passing eggs with color as they go.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Alright troops, it's time to push back. That means eggs! Everywhere! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North looks out over the eggs as they get sorted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Single file!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie, on her back, is carried by the eggs through the sorting stones. She giggles as North waves at her while s passes by.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Heaps of you in every high-rise, farm house and trailer park!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth flies across the screen, diverting our attenti to a multicolored stream off in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: In tennis shoes and cereal bowls!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth joins an elf, who stands alongside an egg at t edge of a cliff. The elf pushes the egg over the cliff, i the stream, and celebrates with a victory dance.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Oh, there will be bathtubs filled with my beautiful googies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The elf turns just in time to see a stampede of colored e come barreling toward him. They knock him off the cliff a he and the eggs spill into the multi-colored stream below

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Colored eggs wade through the water, emerging with SECOND COLORS and intricate PATTERNS of all kinds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An unlucky egg veers off and gets stuck in a WHIRLPOOL. W see a hand fish it out to reveal North, who looks at the curiously. It's now got a SPIRAL PATTERN on it and its little LEGS kick madly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, that's little strange.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Naw, mate --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny's surrounded by butterflies and cute little eggs. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's adorable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As a technicolored elf climbs out of the stream, North se the egg down and lets it rejoin the herd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Sophie leads a parade of eggs, Bunny jumps to an adjac rock and sits up to address the eggs as they walk in stri Meanwhile, Jack rides atop a group of sentinel egg that a marching in the back ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There will be springtime! On every continent! And I'm bringing hope with me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON: a line of eggs running down curled vines as yet sprinkle them with glitter. They continue on down various vine corkscrew-like shoots, decorating the eggs with stri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A confused elf emerges from the vines, striped with paint walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The striped elf walks past a Yeti, painting a mound of eg red. Bunny enters frame and hops across the screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too Christmas-y, mate, paint `em blue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Yeti throws its arms up in defeat and tosses the eggs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautifully painted egg hides in the grass.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh, what's over there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie appears, spots the egg, and delicately lifts it ou the grass. She holds it close to admire the intricate det of its shell. Sophie brings the egg to Bunny for him to inspect. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a beauty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny takes Sophie by the hand and leads her through a st archway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now all we gotta do is get him and his little mates through the tunnels, to the top, and we'll have ourselves Easter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny looks out proudly at the eggs gathered in front of TUNNELS in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack approaches from behind and makes his way alongside Bunny, who holds Sophie in his arms. Its our first real vista of the whole warren. It's a spectacular sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie yawns and begins to fall asleep. Bunny turns to Ja with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not bad yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I'm sorry about that whole, you know, the "kangaroo" thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the accent, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North comes up from behind with Tooth at his side. They t toward Bunny, marveling at the sight of Sophie, fast slee It's touching. Bunny's face softens, as if remembering a distant memory.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, poor little ankle-biter. Look at her, all tuckered out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up from the sleeping toddler toward Jack. He's taught them something today. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 85.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it's time to get her home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny hands the sleeping Sophie over to Tooth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How about I take her home?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, no! Pitch is--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --no match for this. (twirls his staff)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is why we need you here, with us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians look at Jack with concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me, I'll be quick as a bunny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack tries to lay a sleeping Sophie down in her bed, but won't let go of his neck. Finally, she releases her grasp only to roll over and fall out of bed. Baby Tooth gives J a scornful look.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE'S MOM, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Sophie? Is that you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and Baby Tooth's eyes widen. Sophie, asleep on the floor, is quickly covered with a blanket and given a sque stuffed animal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack closes the window and looks to Baby Tooth with a sig relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should get back. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth nods, when...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack stops, confused. Where is that voice coming from? He looks out across the town, toward the woods, and the soun the echoed voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That voice, I know that voice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth looks to him, worried.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With that, Jack leaps off the window ledge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, carried by the wind, flies across town toward the s of the eerie voice. Baby Tooth follows, trying to keep up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack takes a moment to orient himself and lands, settling a rotating vent; as the momentum slowly spins him around, voice calls out to him again.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns, looks to the woods, and takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and Baby Tooth land in the middle of a thickly woode area. It's spooky. Jack scans the forest when again he hears...

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack gives chase. He sprints through the thickets and ent a clearing only to find the decrepit remains of a rotting frame from a child's bed. Very creepy. What would that be doing in the woods, and how long has it been here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, there's still time. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth desperately tries to get Jack's attention by tugging at his tunic, and tweeting desperately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack takes his staff, and breaks through the damaged fram revealing a hole leading deep underground.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What to do? Jack jumps down the hole, reluctantly followe by Baby Tooth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack continues along a long dark tunnel with Baby Tooth c behind. Eventually the labyrinth opens up to reveal a hug underground cavern. Baby Tooth continues to tug at Jack's tunic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (waving Baby Tooth off) Baby Tooth, Baby...come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to find out what that is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack can't believe his eyes. Dozens of huge bird cages hanging from the ceiling, and in them are the mini tooth fairies. They see Jack, and immediately perk up, tweeting and flitting like crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack jumps up onto one of the cages, then quickly leaps a holds onto the side of another one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhhh! keep it down. (leaps to another cage) I'm gonna get you out of here, just as soon as I --

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns away from the fairies, distracted. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 88.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY
dialogues.text: Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath) As I can --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks down and sees the tooth drawers from Tooth's Palace. Mounds of them heaped to the ceiling. And inside the drawers are the missing baby teeth. He drops down to mound and begins rummaging through the drawers, looking a the names on the boxes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In an instant he forgets his duties, and the fairies, and Guardians and everything except those teeth, and the chan to finally get his memory back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cavern suddenly goes darker than it already was. Jack finally looks up, as a shadow of Pitch crawls up a nearby column.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Looking for something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack swings around with his staff, shooting off a blast o ice, but Pitch isn't there. Jack takes off, following the sound of Pitch's cackle as it echoes throughout the chamb

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack rounds a corner as he sees Pitch's shadow glide acro the walls into a shadowed corridor.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Don't be afraid, Jack. I'm not going to hurt you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack continues along a shadowed corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afraid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack sees Pitch on a bridge across the cavern and heads a him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not afraid of you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe not. But you are afraid of something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack steadily approaches, cautious and alert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think so, huh? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know so. It's the one thing I always know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch finally turns to face Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People's greatest fears. Yours is that no one will ever believe in you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Panic flashes in Jack's eyes. As he backs away, the chamb fills with shadows, and Jack is spun around. He's disoriented as he thuds into a wall, which flips to revea that it's actually the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch, unseen now, chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's unsure of where he is. He looks back to see the cavern entrance -- he's right back where he started.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: And worst of all, you're afraid you'll never know why. Why you? Why were you chosen...to be like this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack discovers that the entrance has been blocked with br as Pitch's shadow encroaches on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well fear not, for the answer to that...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch is now directly in front of Jack, holding out a too box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's eyes widen at the sight - the face of a young boy etched into the box, and under it is the name "Jack Frost

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you want them, Jack? Your memories?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds them out to Jack. Jack stares, fighting the impu to grab them. He closes his eyes, struggling to make a decision, but when he opens them again, Pitch has disappeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch's shadow moves across the pillars of the cavern. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack heads down a corridor, cast shadows from the Mini To cages everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Everything you wanted to know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch's face moves in and out of the shadows over the following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...in this little box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every time Jack turns, Pitch disappears. It's like Jack's trapped in a fun house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Multiple Pitch shadows have appeared on the wall around J They're closing in on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why did you end up like this? Unseen. Unable to reach out to anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want the answers so badly. You want to grab them, and fly off with them. But you're afraid of what the Guardians will think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's breath quickens. He's been pushed into a corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're afraid of disappointing them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well let me ease your mind about one thing. They'll never accept you. Not really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shadows have overcome Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (trying to scramble away) Stop it! Stop it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost reluctantly, the shadows back away and Pitch appea before Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After all, you're not one of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack aims his staff at Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know what I am! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 91.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I do. You're Jack Frost. You make a mess wherever you go. Why, you're doing it right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch tosses the box to Jack, who instinctively catches i Jack looks up. Terror comes into Jack's eyes, as he realizes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More to the point Jack, what did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch begins to back away, becoming one with the darkness laughing as he disappears. Jack charges towards him only be swallowed whole by one of Pitch's black holes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack flies out of Pitch's shadow, ready to strike. Sudden Jack realizes he's forgotten something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to re-enter the hole in the wall only to find himself face to face with one of Bunny's stone emblems.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Happy Easter, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns around. Suddenly, his eyes fill with dread as realizes where he is. Thousands of broken egg shells lay strewn about, forming a path toward the light at the end the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny peaks through the bushes to take in the scene - an Easter Egg hunt. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are no eggs. There's none anywhere. I give up. Come on, let's go. I don't understand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny checks the eggs in his basket, then looks back towa the kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he just hid them really well this year.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny, egg basket in hand, approaches a group of kids who seem to be wandering around searching halfheartedly, disappointed and listless.

dialogues.speaker: BUNNYMUND, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Kids! Oi!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I checked everywhere! There's nothing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (steps towards them) Yes there is! There is! I mean these aren't my best lookin' googies, but they'll do in a pinch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds out a broken Easter egg. The kids just stare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no such thing as the Easter Bunny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl turns to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easter's over. Forget this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's only then that we realize he's too late. The spark o childhood has already been extinguished in all of them. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Wrong! Not, not true! I'm right in front of ya, mate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no such thing. I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids walk through Bunnymund as if he were a ghost. Bu is stunned by this, and finally realizes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now come on. I don't understand. Why wouldn't he come? Let's get out of here. Easter Bunny, where are you? This is the worst Easter ever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't see me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't see me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JACK's watching this all unfold and it's heartbreaking, because he knows it's his fault. Tooth flies to Bunny's side. Jack hears a rustle in the bushes behind him.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack, where were you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack sees North, with his scimitars drawn and having just come from battle. He's exhausted, wild-eyed, distraught.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmares attacked the tunnels. They smashed every egg, crushed every basket. Nothing made it to the surface.

dialogues.speaker: TOOTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth rejoins the group from off screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks down at the tooth box in his hand, then back t Tooth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was...it's... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 94.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's Baby Tooth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Jack, what have you done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is why you weren't here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North steps forward to confront Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were with Pitch?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, listen, listen...I'm sorry. I didn't mean for this to happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He has to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns to see Bunny, disheartened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should never have trusted you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easter is new beginnings, new life. Easter is about hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now it's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny turns away and moves toward the park, looking at th sign that reads, `Easter Egg Hunt.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is like a punch in Jack's gut. He looks back to Toot and North, both of whom look away, too hurt by Jack. He looks at them with a pained expression. This is exactly w Pitch said would happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack reaches into his pocket, pulls out the tiny Russian nesting doll that North had given him, drops the doll to ground, and takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jack leaves, carried off by the wind, we see the tiny Russian nesting doll laying on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 95.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie, atop a ladder, strains for what looks like an East egg, hiding in the rain gutter. The ladder totters and Ja loses his balance, beginning to fall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoaaa, whoa, whoa...aaaah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie grabs the gutter but it breaks loose, sending Jamie crashing down into a mound of snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jamie gets up off the ground, he sees that the Easter was in fact a dirty old tennis ball. Jamie stands up, bewildered, and dusts himself off as his friends LAUGH. A few have empty EASTER BASKETS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's check the park again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For what, the Easter Bunny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, I told you - I saw him! He's way bigger than I thought, and he's got these cool boomerang-things-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grow up, Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah man, seriously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happened to you guys?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was a dream. You should be happy you still get dreams like that and not...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They begin to turn away from him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nightmares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pippa's the lone straggler. She looks tired, depressed, a hands Jamie her basket as she leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget it, Jamie. There's just no Easter this year.

dialogues.speaker: CALEB, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I can't believe this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He really is real!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pippa walks away, trailing the others. Jamie doesn't know what to believe. He hangs his head and looks into the Eas basket, it's empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know he is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yetis stare at the globe of belief, in shock as more and lights begin to fad away. We push in toward Antarctica as

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack runs to the edge of a floating iceberg, ready to thr his tooth box into the ocean. He resists, looking down at the box as he clutches it in his hand. He's never been mo alone in his life.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: I thought this might happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch is revealed, standing not far behind Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They never really believed in you. I was just trying to show you that. But I understand. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack whips around and shoots a burst of frost at Pitch, b it's quickly deflected by the Nightmare sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't understand anything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack continues to attack, lashing out with his staff. Pit blocks the attacks of ice and frost -- his control over t Nightmare sand has gained considerable strength.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No? I don't know what it's like to be cast out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch strikes back, putting Jack on the defense. Jack jum in the air. Their show of force escalates until they're shrouded in a blanket of snow, ice, and wind. As the wind and snow settle, Jack looks around stern and alert.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: To not be believed in. To long for a family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns around to find Pitch. There's a look of compassion on Jack's face as he listens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All those years in the shadows I thought, no one else knows what this feels like. But now I see I was wrong.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They lock eyes. A moment of true connection between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have to be alone, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't a trick Pitch is making a real offer here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I believe in you. And I know children will too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! Look at what we can do!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch gestures to a fantastical ice and nightmare "sculpt that was created (off-screen) when Jack attacked him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What goes together better than cold and dark?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks at the fractured reflections of themselves cas the icy sculpture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can make them believe. We'll give them a world where everything, everything is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns to face Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch black...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch, realizing how this looks, clarifies...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Jack Frost too. They'll believe in both of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack stares at him, considering the offer. Then finally..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, they'll fear both of us. And that's not what I want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack turns and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now for the last time, leave me alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch looks confused and hurt. This is not the response h was expecting. Then...his eyes flame with anger. He made himself vulnerable, and Jack rejected him. No more negotiating now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very well. You want to be left alone? Done. But first...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Jack hears a familiar twitter. Pitch reaches int his coat to pull out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack charges forward. There's terror in Baby Tooth's eyes She squeaks as Pitch clenches her tight with his fist. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 99.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The staff, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack settles and the winds and snow subsides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have a bad habit of interfering. Now hand it over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'll let her go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (twitters - Don't give it to him!)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth struggles to get loose, but Pitch only tighten his grip. She can hardly breathe. Jack has no choice. Jack...hands over...the staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch twirls the staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: Baby Tooth) Alright, now let her go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You said you wanted to be alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So be alone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth squirms until she's finally able to peck Pitch the hand with her beak. Pitch shrieks and throws Baby Too in the air and down into the mouth of a crevasse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, enraged, can't believe what he's seeing. Pitch lift the staff, and breaks it over his knee, cracking it in tw Light EXPLODES from the staff and terror comes into Jack' eyes, clutching his chest as if in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Pitch sends a burst of Nightmare sand, blasting Jack and slamming him into the iceberg wall behind him. A the ice cracks, Jack comes loose and falls forward into t chasm below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch looks down into the ice fissure chuckling. He throw the broken shards of Jack's staff down into the crevasse casually walks away, disappearing on the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 100.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's cold and dark down here, and Jack is more alone than he's ever been. Battered from the fall, Jack slowly looks and notices Baby Tooth, lying lifelessly on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls himself to her and cradles her in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth nods, but she's hurt, and cold. Jack does his best to shield her from the cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, all I can do is keep you cold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack sits up and holds Baby Tooth in his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch was right - I make a mess of everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is devastated. Baby Tooth's never seen him like this it's heart breaking...then she gets a thought. Her expression hardens with determination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She wriggles deep into his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack leans back and begins to close his eyes when he hear

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY
dialogues.text: Jack... Jack...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- and then he FEELS something. Looks down: There's a SOF GOLDEN GLOW coming from his pocket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack jumps, taken aback. He reaches in and pulls out the TOOTH BOX -- it's pulsing with light.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE FROM A MEMORY
dialogues.text: Jack... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth gives him a reassuring look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth motions to the box, then looks back at Jack. J reaches to touch the box, but as he does its top magicall UNFOLDS to reveal a handful of BABY TEETH - then the box everything else glows BRIGHT WITH INTENSE LIGHT -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WALLS of the fissure seem to suddenly fall away. In brief FLASHES we see: The COLONIAL SETTLEMENT Jack visite Children running playfully down a hill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on Jack, you can't have fun all the time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHILDREN'S LAUGHING FACES as a familiar BOY hangs upside from a tree limb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, get down from there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HAPPY FAMILY at a roaring fire as the same boy jokes ar with antlers on his head.

dialogues.speaker: COLONIAL BOY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: You're funny, Jack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack walks toward the woods with his sister. His mother, face unseen, calls out to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack shakes his head like he's heard it a million times b never pays it any mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are on an eye, a familiar eye but this one is brown no blue. PULL BACK to reveal young JACK, brown hair, brown eyes. He is staring directly at the camera, a look of...w is it? It's hard to read but it's VERY intense. We keep pulling back to reveal him dressed as we first saw him in 16th century clothes. Behind him, dark winter trees and s come in to focus. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 102.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (calm, serious) It's okay. It's okay. Don't look down, just look at me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack reaches slowly down and removes the second of two rudimentary ice-skates, leaving him BAREFOOT on the surfa of a familiar FROZEN pond. And now we see what he sees, a girl of about FOUR (with an uncanny resemblance to Jamie' sister Sophie) stands in her skates, rooted to the spot. spider's web of cracks emanates from where she stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, I'm scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRACCKKK! The ice below her splinters more. She wobbles a it starts to separate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, I know...but you're gonna be alright. You're not gonna fall in. We're gonna have a little fun instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No we're not!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would I trick you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fighting back tears) Yes! You always play tricks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, alright. Well, not, not this time. I promise. I promise, you're gonna be...you're gonna be fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack fixes her gaze...holds it...there's nothing but the of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to believe in me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's sister pauses a moment, then smiles through her fe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And just like that, Jack's demeanor changes. A light is switched on inside him and the last thing that could be happening is what is actually happening. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 103.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (casual, playfully) You wanna play a game? We're going to play Hopscotch! Like we play every day!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's sister looks more reassured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's as easy as...one...whoaaaa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Jack shows his sister the first leap, but mugs for he almost losing his balance then catching himself. She laug

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two... (the next jump) Three!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns toward her with his arms spread out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches down to pick up a familiar-looking stick lying the ice. He extends it towards her --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now it's your turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's sister looks down. She is trying to gather her courage. Jack, never breaking his gaze with her,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hops, wobbling, but catching her balance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it, that's it...two...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's almost there, Jack's staff just beyond her reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs hold of Jack's staff and in one massive effort slings her with all his might to safety. But the movement propels him into the cracked ice. He looks up to see his sister safe - smiles - and then plunges into the dark col water. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 104.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack falls back into the icy water. SPLASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're looking up at the hole in the ice, descending into dark icy depths...then THE FULL MOON appears from behind clouds as Jack's hands claw through the water towards it, it's helpless. The MOON glows bright...brighter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's BODY begins to glow, bathed in MOONLIGHT. PUSH IN his FACE, becoming brighter and brighter until his brown turns white and JACK'S BRIGHT BLUE EYES flash open --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The icy walls rush back in as we pull out from Jack, reel from the memory. He sees Baby Tooth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you -- did you see that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shakes her head `no', tweets `of course not'!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It -- it was me! I had a family! I had a sister!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His excitement suddenly turns to realization.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saved her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up at the opening above. The MOON peeks out from behind the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers up to Manny) That's why you chose me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm, I'm a Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Moon seems to shine a little BRIGHTER. Baby Tooth tri to take flight but she sputters and lands back in the pal Jack's hand. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 105.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks down at the two halves of his staff, and picks them up. He tries to fit them back together, but nothing happens. He tries again, this time using every ounce of strength left in him. Baby Tooth watches, her eyes wideni as, a SPARK of blue light shoots off the staff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack continues to push, until a the icy blue light spread and melds the two ends of the staff back together. Jack smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Jack, with Baby Tooth tucked safely in his tunic SHOOTS UP out of the fissure, high into the sky and throu the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on Baby Tooth! I owe you one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SERIES OF QUICK CUTS: The Mini Teeth TWITTER as Jack ju from CAGE to CAGE, opening them as he goes. Jack opens another cage and notices the fairies standing still.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks around and notices that all of the Minis are s in their cages.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fairies are just standing around, listless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: None of you can fly?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Baby Tooth directs Jack's attention to the Globe at the b of Pitch's lair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights... Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 106.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Yeti very carefully sets the last of a group of newly painted red robot dolls on a shelf. He breathes a sigh of relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the entire factory begins to shake, knocking th robot doll to the ground. He dives after it, juggles it i the air, and catches it just before it hits the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, streaks of BLACK SAND whoosh up into and around factory. The dark sand snakes its way up and around the globe, causing the Yetis and Elves to scatter and knockin TOYS to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Yetis and Elves look up in horror as the black sand, covering the globe, gives rise to Pitch, who stands befor them cackling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're all free to go! We won't be needing any Christmas toys this year, thank you! Nor ever again!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The yeti with the robot dolls sinks his head and sighs in defeat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack lands on the ground, now standing before PITCH'S GLO and it looks almost completely devoid of light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're all going out...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch is practically dancing across North's globe, he's s giddy, counting down as the last few lights go dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only six left! Six precious children who still believe in the Guardians with all their h-- (a lights blinks out) Make that, five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oo! Four!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three!

dialogues.speaker: TWO
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 107.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes widen as he snaps his fingers with anticipation glee. All of his hard work and planning - finally paying off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch stares down at the one last light, waiting for it t out. He snaps his fingers a few more times. Still nothing His smile fades. His face goes cold as he realizes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack jumps up onto the globe to closely inspect the last light. The light is brought into full view. Jack smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're tight on the globe, where the LAST LIGHT flickers. PUSH IN to the light and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...down onto the streets of Burgess. We race over the tow until we land on Jamie's house, a single light shining fr his bedroom window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie is sitting up in bed, talking to an old stuffed rab and whispering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay look, you and I are obviously at what they call a crossroads, so here's what's gonna happen -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack appears outside Jamie's window and moves closer to g better look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If it wasn't a dream and if you are real, then you have to prove it. Like right now. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 108.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie waits. He looks around expectantly. Jack looks on from outside the window, wondering if anything will happe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (desperation creeping in) I've believed in you for a long time, okay? Like my whole life in fact. So you kinda owe me now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie picks up his stuffed rabbit and holds it close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't have to do much, just a little sign so I know. Anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything at all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He waits. It's excruciating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie lets the stuffed animal fall to the floor. Jack com into the room and watches as the light slowly fades from Jamie's eyes, disbelief setting in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack doesn't know what to do. He takes a moment to concentrate, then enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then, Jamie notices the window as the panes of glass free over. The image of an Easter egg suddenly appears...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (seeing the window) Huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie looks down at the stuffed rabbit on the floor. He c barely comprehend what he's seeing. Jamie looks back to t window as more of the window panes frost over. Jamie's ey get huge with amazement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's real.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, excited, continues to exert himself trying to bring life to his drawing. And when he does, the frost rabbit comes leaping off of the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rabbit hops around Jamie's room, bursting like a snow over Jamie's head, the snowflakes sprinkling down on him. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 109.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack is as amazed as Jamie. But Jamie's amazement turns t confusion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snow?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A snowflake lands on the tip of Jamie's nose. The snowfla glows a magic blue. And in that moment a light comes into Jamie's eyes - an idea starts to take hold.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a stunned beat) Did he just say--?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie stands up on his bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He said it again. He said --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie turns around and suddenly his eyes go wide...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right! But-but that's me! Jack Frost! That's my name! You said my name!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie's mouth drops open. Only then does Jack realize...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, can you hear me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you... Can you see me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees me. He sees me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack leaps for joy, and the room suddenly explodes with s Jamie can't believe it. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 110.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just made it snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In my room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're real?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Who do you think brings you all the blizzards and snow days, and you remember when you went flying on that sled the other day?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cool!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But what about the Easter Bunny and the Tooth Fairy I mean--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Real-real-real! Every one of us is real!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie's mom calls from down the hall...

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE'S MOM, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jamie, who are you talking to?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um...Jack Frost. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 111.

dialogues.speaker: JAMIE'S MOM, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: (a little chuckle) ...okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the sound of thunder and North's sleigh as Jack Jamie look to the open window.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NORTH AND TOOTH arrive on the sleigh completely out of control, and crash land outside Jamie's house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The reindeer are separated from the sleigh and run into t woods. A disheveled Tooth and North emerge from the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, moi deti! Come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As North stands, his back suddenly gives out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North! Are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is official. My powers are kaput.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack comes flying toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (flies to him) Jack--!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth falters and falls to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They greet each other with a smile as North draws near. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 112.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same as you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks off to the side as Jamie appears from out of h backyard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last light!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to North and Tooth) Wow! It is you! I mean it is you! I knew it wasn't a dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack! He sees you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack puts a protective hand on Jamie's shoulder. Jamie lo up at him and smiles. Jack and North exchange a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, but, where's Bunny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Losing Easter took its toll on all of us. Bunny most of all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's face goes pale. North lowers his head in sadness. Then a twitchy-nosed LITTLE BUNNY appears on the sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh...no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the Easter Bunny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now somebody sees me! I mean, where were you about an hour ago, mate?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to him? He used to be huge and cool! And now he's cute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie gently tickles Bunny under his chin. Bunny begins involuntarily thumping his paw.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, that's good. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 113.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny catches himself and pushes Jamie's hands away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you tell him to say that? (hops over to Jack) That's it! Let's go! Me and you! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Actually he told me you were real. Just when I started to think that maybe you weren't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny stops. Did he just hear that right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He made you believe? In me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A moment of reconciliation between them, broken by the so of THUNDER. The Guardians look to the sky to see Pitch enveloped by dark clouds as he stares down at them from a a writhing mass of Nightmare sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the others) Get Jamie out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be careful, Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack leaps into the air, and goes flying directly at Pitc Meanwhile, the Guardians take Jamie to find shelter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His eyes flash with anger at see Jack coming toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost! Let's end this, shall we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch sighs as he rolls his eyes and flies down to meet J head on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack sends a blast of ice and frost at Pitch as he barrel toward him. Pitch easily absorbs the attack with his Nightmare sand. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 114.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That little trick doesn't work on me anymore.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack's plan backfires as Pitch charges ahead and unleashe roaring fury of Nightmare sand that knocks Jack out of th sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie and the Guardians do their best to avoid the patrol Nightmares. North struggles to keep up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick, this way this way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny leads them down an alley, but it's no use.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dead end. Other way other way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack suddenly falls from the sky, lands on a dumpster, an falls limp to the ground. THUD! The others turn their attention and wince.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
