dialogues.text: Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They rush to Jack and help him to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was good try, Jack! A for effort!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (groaning in pain) He's stronger. I can't beat him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North and Tooth trade looks of concern. Then, a menacing chuckle. The Guardians keep a watchful eye as Nightmare shadow streaks across the alley.

dialogues.speaker: PITCH, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: All this fuss over one little boy. And still he refuses to stop believing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CRACK of Thunder reveals the shadow of an approaching Nightmare as the sounds of hooves clacking against the gr echoes from the opposite end of the alley. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 115.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very well. There are other ways to snuff out a light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bulbs start bursting as the arm of a shadow moves across remaining lights in the alley. Terror in Jamie's eyes. Wh does that mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you want him, you're gonna have to go through me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a finger raised, the shadow arm glides along the flo curling around the back of Bunny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing, genuinely) Look how fluffy you are! Would you like a scratch behind the ears?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny jumps back into North's arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you even think about it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch comes into view, riding atop Onyx. A gleeful smile strewn across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't tell you how happy it makes me to see you all like this. You look awful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are weak and defenseless. But still the Guardians gather around Jamie, to shield him from whatever may come

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, I'm scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a sudden moment of realization. Jack has heard th words before.

dialogues.speaker: JACK'S SISTER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Jack, I'm scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pan up from the ice to find his sister as he saw her i his memory. She is smiling. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 116.

dialogues.speaker: JACK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I know, I know. But you're gonna be alright...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, wide eyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonnna have a little fun, instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it. That's my center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie gives Jack a questioning look. What does Jack have mind? Pitch gets closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what do you think, Jamie? Do you believe in the Boogiema...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOF! A snowball suddenly hits Pitch in the face. Two Nightmares look at each, unsure how to react. Jamie can't help but snicker and North lets out a chuckle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks around the alley. He spots a wooden crate, a trash can lid and a discarded wok amidst a pile of trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now let's go get your friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch wipes the snow from his face and looks up to see a track of ice leading out of the alleyway. Jack, Jamie and the Guardians are gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An aerial view of Burgess. The streets are empty and the city is quiet. Suddenly a streak of blue begins to materialize, making its way through the tranquil suburb.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man walks his dog across an empty street when suddenly cold wind blows behind him. Jack and Jamie come flying pa leaving a trail of ice in their wake. And on that ice - t Guardians careen along in make-shift sleds. They are scar and thrilled, but they're having fun. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 117.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Cool!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A terrified Cupcake lies in bed awake. The Guardians' reflections streak across the window when suddenly, BOOF! snowball strikes the pane of glass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cupcake pulls the covers down to find that it's suddenly SNOWING inside! As the snow circles around Cupcake's head she sits up and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pippa sits in bed amazed as it snows in her room. She hea a KNOCK at her window and moves toward it to find Jamie floating outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She throws open her window and looks down to the ground t reveal that they are two stories up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie, how are you doing that?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack Frost! Come on, we need your help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie takes off flying down the street, and as a snowflak lands on her nose she suddenly sees him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey is, is that?

dialogues.speaker: MONTY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jack Frost!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pippa looks up to see Monty across the street with his he out the window and snow coming down in his room, a gaping smile across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caleb and Claude sit up in bed in amazement, staring at t snowflakes as they stream down from the ceiling. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 118.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUD! The twins look down to find neatly wrapped gifts at the feet of their beds as a jolly voice bellows in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: NORTH, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Merry Christmas!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twins open their window, amazed to see their heroes s past.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy Easter!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't forget to floss!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caleb looks to his brother, dumbfounded. Suddenly Cupcake skids past, laughing and screaming on her own sled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cupcake?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And so it goes through the town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: PIPPA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Jamie you were right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Easter Bunny's real!

dialogues.speaker: PIPPA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: And the Tooth Fairy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Santa!

dialogues.speaker: MONTY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: They're all real!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 119.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, the Guardians, and the children all come to gliding halt on their sleds. They look up to see Pitch standing a a building with a confident smile, while the clouds stir behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Monty, late to the party, comes running joyously past Jam and the Guardians who stand in silence as they stare up a the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, yeaaaaaaaah!!! (sees Pitch, makes U-Turn) Ahhhhhhhhhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think a few children can help you? Against this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmare sand storm descends from the sky. North dra his sword, but the weight of the blade pulls him down. He can barely stand. Jack moves to North's side as they look back to Jamie, noticing the concern on his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're just bad dreams, Jamie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we'll protect you, mate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aww, you'll protect them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But who will protect you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie takes a moment to reflect while his friends look up the sky in fear. Jack looks down, surprised, to see that Jamie has taken a position in FRONT of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Jamie's friends move to join him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will.

dialogues.speaker: CALEB AND CLAUDE
dialogues.text: I will. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 120.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians, amazed, watch as the kids squeeze past the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still think there's no such thing as the boogeyman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch's wave of Nightmare sand snakes its way through tow causing destruction wherever it goes and converges toward single point as it heads straight toward the kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I do believe in you. I'm just not afraid of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie thrusts out his hand toward the Nightmare wave. His friends follow suite, just as the Nightmare sand smashes them. As it makes contact, the black sand...bursts into streams of GOLDEN DREAMSAND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa...whoaaaa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone is amazed, hardly believing their eyes. Streams Dreamsand swirl around the children. And then it's pandemonium. The Nightmares buck and jump as the sand mak its way past them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He watches, aghast, as his precious Nightmares transform into golden Dreamsand and makes its way across town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth, amazed, watches as her wings suddenly flutter with resurgence of strength and energy. She takes off and flie past the kids who cheer her on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, Tooth Fairy! Whooaaa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North's eyes widen. He straightens his back and unsheathe his scimitars. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 121.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Get them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch gives a signal and sends another wave of Nightmares toward the Guardians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do your jobs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The petite rabbit looks at himself, waiting to be transformed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah, come on, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When suddenly he's pursued by a snarling Nightmare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, crikey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny takes off running.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North throws two snowglobes down to the ground, through w an army of yetis and elves emerge.

dialogues.speaker: CALEB AND CLAUDE
dialogues.text: No way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny tries to scurry under a parked car in order to evad the attacking Nightmare, but he is snatched by his tail before he can get away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just a bunny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Bunny transforms back to his normal size and wh out his boomerangs while being held upside down. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 122.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: G'day, mate!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny kicks the Nightmare, flips into the air, and throws boomerangs which slice through two more Nightmares, turni them to dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny drums his feet on the ground and an army of sentine eggs suddenly rise up out of the earth. Caleb finds himse riding on top of one as they join the yetis and elves in battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! Wooooohoooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elves riding toy ducks and planes come flying in overhead like bombardiers, turning Nightmares into puffs of black as they fly through them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids look to see a Nightmare charging toward them, on to stop in it's tracks once the kids turn to face it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get `em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aaaaaahhhhhh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids, accompanied by two elves in a bike and side car charge an incoming Nightmare. The elf behind the wheel lunges toward it, biting at its haunches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on guys, we can do it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The kids put their hands on the Nightmare, turning it to Dreamsand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch looks down with a smile at the chaos in the streets below. Suddenly, a THUD! Pitch turns toward the noise to see Jack on the roof. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 123.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack quickly sends a streak of frost toward Pitch's Nightmares, disabling a few of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians turn toward the explosions of ice and snow taking place atop the surrounding buildings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch begins to charge and responds with an attack of his own. Jack jumps to an adjacent roof and lets out another blast of ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All yours, mate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny taps his foot on the ground and creates a rabbit ho for North and himself to travel through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack runs into Pitch as he rounds the corner of a chimney Pitch let's a Nightmare arrow fly, which is suddenly deflected by Tooth as she flies through the area and take out a few Nightmares of her own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Tooth!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Bunny comes flying out of a nearby chimney, dra his boomerang as he lands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ho, ho, HO! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 124.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Nightmares surrounding Pitch explode into dust as the boomerang tears through them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North shoots out of a bunny hole, his scimitars at the re only to have landed on a roof some distance from the Guardians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong roof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch tries to escape the attacking Guardians and slips i a nearby shadow, emerging through the side of the buildin North jumps off the roof to greet him mid-air with his scmitars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch is knocked to the ground. As he gets to his feet he forms a scythe with his Nightmare sand and begins crossin swords with North.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In an instant Pitch finds himself surrounded by the Guardians. Each of them take their turn to deal Pitch a f humiliating blows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie looks over Caleb's shoulder as a wisp of Dreamsand leaves his palms and rises into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gets an idea) I got it. (off their confused looks)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 125.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what we have to do! Guys, come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie leads his friends as they follow the streams of Dreamsand down the street toward the growing mass of gold sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Guardians advance toward Pitch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over Pitch! There's no place to hide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch give them a wry smile and quickly descends into the shadows, casting multiple versions of himself along the a walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, in their moment of distraction, Pitch rises up behind Jack, his Nightmare sand AXE in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack, look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other Guardians look on in horror as--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A golden whip wraps itself round Pitch's hands. We follow the whip to reveal Sandy, coalescing from the funnel clou Dreamsand. He gives Pitch a look, wags his finger, and th uppercuts him into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! The Sandman!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy looks off to the side to where Jamie and his friend have gathered. He forms a Dreamsand hat and tips the cap Jamie. Jamie, gleeful, waves back to Sandy as his friends stand behind him in awe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man, this is so cool! Yeah, alright! Wahoo! Wow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy then looks to his whip and tugs on it, slamming Pit into the ground and knocking him out. The Guardians cheer they welcome Sandy's return. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 126.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome back, old friend!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Sandy. You're alright!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy, come here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mate, you are a sight for sore eyes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy floats into the air, and shoots streams of Dreamsan every direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wisp of Dreamsand floats into a child's bedroom and tou his forehead while he sleeps. Suddenly, a Dreamsand figur forms above the child's head, it's the Tooth Fairy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights begin to appear on the globe. Baby Tooth notices this, and perks up. Her wings start to flutter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Other fairies begin to fly. They shoot down to the tooth boxes and begin opening them. We see one of the faces on box, and transition to the actual child who she goes from to happy as her fondest memories flood back. We zoom out her face to see thousands of fluttering fairies and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sophie peers out of her bedroom window, watching as strea of Dreamsand dance along the Burgess skyline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 127.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More and more windows begin to shine bright with gold as swirls of Dreamsand fill the night sky. We pull back to reveal the globe in North's sleigh, now decorated with sp of yellow light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Nightmare comes barreling towards Cupcake. It screeches a halt, inches from the girl's face. She gently taps the creature on the nose and turns into a Dreamsand Unicorn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A gigantic Dreamsand dinosaur foot comes down revealing a Dreamsand brontosaurus. As Dreamsand creatures fill the streets, the Guardians and children rejoice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie stands in awe of a school of beautiful Dreamsand fi as they float by. Suddenly, he's hit in the head with a snowball. He turns to look and sees Jack, smiling. Jamie picks up a snowball and throws it at his friends. Almost instantaneously, a snowball fight ensures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah? Bring it on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sandy salutes Jack and North, who are standing off to the side while the snowball fight escalates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your center?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It took awhile, but I figured it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North tosses Jack a small item. Jack catches it and looks his open palm, it's a Russian nesting doll in the image o Jack, similar to those found in North's workshop. Jack smiles and North gives him a wink in return. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 128.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOF! North is suddenly hit by a snowball and turns. He sees Claude, Caleb, and an elf; they immediately point fingers at each other.

dialogues.speaker: CALEB AND CLAUDE
dialogues.text: Ooohhh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat, until North bursts out in laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're all on naughty list.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bunny, think fast!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws a snowball, which hits Bunny smack in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch groans in pain, and rises up to see the town crawli with Dreamsand creatures, snowballs flying and yetis play

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whips around to see the kids - having the time of thei lives - and no fear in their eyes. He rises up, his entir body shaking with rage, and screams at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You dare have fun in my presence! I am the Boogeyman! AND YOU WILL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lunges at Jamie who come running toward him, Pitch's h outstretched as if he's going to grab him by the throat. Jamie runs right through him, laughing, joyous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch gasps, realizing that he no longer has any power ov the children. The devastation plays across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breathe) No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees the Guardians approach, standing side by side wit one another. Pitch turns and flees into the forest. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 129.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch runs through the shadows in terror. He comes crashi through the trees of the forest, and out onto the ice of pond. He looks over his shoulder to see if the Guardians on his tail, when BOOM! He runs smack into North's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch slips on the ice, and falls backwards. He looks up see North smiling down at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leaving the party so soon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You didn't even say goodbye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth tosses something to Pitch which he catches. He look down. It's a quarter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A quarter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BLAM. A fist punches him right in the jaw, and a single tooth goes skittering across the ice. Tooth shakes out he hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that's for my fairies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't get rid of me! Not forever! There will always be fear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what? As long as one child believes, we will be here to fight fear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really? Then what are they doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hundreds of Nightmares emerge from the woods, surrounding pond. It's terrifying, but the Guardians seem unphased.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They can't be my Nightmares, I'm not afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like it's your fear they smell. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 130.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Pitch's eyes get huge with terror as the Nightm move in on him. He begins to back away, but the Nightmare pick up speed as they charge toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahhh, no....AAAAAHHHHHH!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tries to run, but it's impossible to get his footing o the ice. He falters, and is swept up in the stampede of Nightmares. The streaks of black whip and latch themselve onto Pitch as the black cloud carries him through the for

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, nooooooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pitch struggles to escape, but the mass of black sand pul him deep into the forest, under the frame of the broken b and back down into the dark depths of the underground. He looks up at the moon as he disappears and the hole in the earth seals itself up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pale and faint in the day, but oddly close and welcoming. can't be, but -- is that the barest hint of a FACE on the Moon? Jack smiles as he looks up at it. He hears Tooth's laugh and turns to find North, Tooth, Bunny and Sandy, th faces shining with pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tooth comes flying in to give Jack a hug. She lifts him o the ground as they embrace. They share a moment and she s recoils with giddy embarrassment as Baby Tooth interjects

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack acknowledges Baby Tooth and gently pats her on the s of her face as North steps forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you ready now, Jack?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To make it official.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks over, a stern elf is hitting a horn against hi palm. A Yeti hands North the book we saw when Jack and th Guardians first met. Sandy and Bunny share a boastful loo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then is time you take Oath. Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 131.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North opens the book, flips through several pages, and ta a moment before he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Will you, Jack Frost...vow to watch over the children of the world?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie and his friends along with a crowd of yetis, elves, eggs all make their way across the pond to the rest of th group. As they approach we see settle on Jamie, who stand at the center of the group.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To guard them with your life - their hopes, their wishes, and their dreams? For they are all that we have, all that we are and all that we will ever be."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack takes a second to look back at Jamie, then back to North.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then congratulations, Jack Frost - for you are now and forevermore...a Guardian.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie and the kids erupt in a CHEER, as do the Yetis and Eggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh man! Woo! Yeah, Jack! Yeah, Jack! Yeah! Wooo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yippa!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! Wooo! Good job, mate. Good job!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright! Yeah! Go, Jack! Alright! Woo. Alright! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 132.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Klasno!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North picks up Jack, gives him a hug, and kisses him on b cheeks. Jack winces, then looks up to North with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my boy! Woo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright Jack. Yeah! Awesome!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imitating North, an elf picks up the elf standing next to and gives him a big kiss. After an awkward pause, the affectionate elf is punched in the face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks to see several fairies hovering nearby, formin the shape of a heart. One of the swooning fairies faints falls to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it together, girls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack! You did it Jack! Wooo! You're in the Guardians! Yeah, Jack! Yay! Yeah! You earned it! You're Jack Frost! Yay! Awesome, yay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys, look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's Santa's sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group looks up to the sky as North's sleigh comes in a landing. The tie-dyed elf rescues a lone egg from the s of the sleigh as it glides across the icy pond.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow, it's real. That is wicked! Whoa, that was awesome! Ohh...can you believe this? Whoa, did you guys see that? That's awesome! Wow! Whoa! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 133.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to North, wryly) Everyone loves the sleigh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow! Look at that! So totally insane!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North turns away from Bunny and puts his hand on Jack's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Time to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the kids look on in wonder, Sandy throws up his hands creating a shower of Dreamsand, which drifts down on the children.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! It's beautiful. Wow, that was awesome!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Bunny hands an egg to Sophie who giggles and p the brim of his nose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Happy Easter ya little anklebiter. I'm gonna miss yah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bye, bye, bunny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie realizes what's about to happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're leaving? But, what if Pitch comes back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack looks back at Jamie, who seems wistful and worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if we stop believing again? If I can't see you --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack kneels down to look Jamie in the eye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, hey, slow down, slow down. You telling me you stop believing in the moon when the sun comes up? Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 134.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (considers, then) No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, well do you stop believing in the sun when clouds block it out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll always be there, Jamie. And now...we'll always be here. (points to Jamie's heart) Which kind of makes you a Guardian too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie smiles. Jack stands up and heads toward the sleigh. Jamie's friends stand off to the side rubbing their eyes they become drowsy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't keep my eyes open. I think I gotta go home. Let's go home. What time is it? I'm sleepy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jamie runs over and wraps his arms around Jack. For a moment, Jack's astonished and then gives Jamie a warm embrace. Jack stands up and gets in the sleigh with the r of the Guardians.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hyah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack and the Guardians look toward the kids as the sleigh takes off. Jamie RUNS behind the sleigh, following Jack. spite of it all, he doesn't want to let go. The sleigh ta off into the sky. Jamie stops unable to follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woooo! Yeah! Yay! Guardians Screening Script 9/6/12 Avid 135.

dialogues.speaker: JACK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: My name is Jack Frost. And I'm a Guardian. How do I know that? Because the moon told me so. And when the moon tells you something, believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jack moves to the back of the sleigh as the Guardians pat on the back. Jack smiles...and forms a snowflake in his hand. For Jamie, for all of us in the theatre. It glides off his fingertips and flies toward camera as we...
